snippet.title: Secret of Evermore commercial
snippet.description:
TV commercial for the SNES video game, Secret of Evermore, circa 1995 or so.  It was produced for us by a Seattle ad agency called "McFarland Richards & Graf".  I'm assuming they farmed out the animation. That's all I know about it.

I am supplying this for the sake of historical/archival interests.  This video is not monetized and never should be.  If YouTube auto-monetizes it, please notify me by DM so I can undo it.

This video came with no accompanying metadata, but it is safe to assume it is ©1995 Squaresoft (now folded into Square-Enix), and that all standard copyright laws are applicable.
